Track I Inspired by Princess Leia's cinnamon buns hairstyle, Tim Burton's "Blue Girl With Wine", and rachmaninoff's Piano Concerto No. 2 Jane Lle Publishing (ASCAP)/ Thesaurus Rex (Roman Irvin publishing designee)/ Tang Nivri Publishing (ASCAP)/ Ink Is An Instrument (ASCAP) Recorded at Wondaland Studios, Atlanta, GA Mixed by Nate Wonder & Roman GianArthur at Wondaland Studios and Phil Tan for RiotProof Productions at Soapbox Studios, Atlanta, GA Mastered at COS Mastering, Atlanta, GA * Based on the songs "Say You'll Go", "Cold War", "Ba Bop Bye Ya", and "57821" Track II Inspired by Li'l Ze from City of God, Fela's cigarettes, and Bob Marley's smile Jane Lle Publishing (ASCAP)/ Tang Nivri Publishing (ASCAP)/ Ink Is An Instrument (ASCAP)/ Saul Williams publishing designee Produced for Wondaland Productions Recorded at Wondaland Recording Studios, Atlanta, GA Mixed by Phil Tan for RiotProof Productions at Soapbox Studios, Atlanta, GA and Christopher Carmouche at Farmhouse Studios, Atlanta, GA Mastered at COS Mastering, Atlanta, GA Horn arrangement for Hornz Unlimited Track III Inspired by Chuck Lightning's Rollercoaster Romantic Escapades and Cindi's Malfunctioning Emotion Engine Jane Lle Publishing (ASCAP)/ Tang Nivri Publishing (ASCAP)/ Ink Is An Instrument (ASCAP) Produced for Wondaland Productions Recorded at Wondaland Recording Studios, Atlanta, GA Mixed by Phil Tan for RiotProof Productions at Soapbox Studios, Atlanta, GA and Christopher Carmouche at Farmhouse Studios, Atlanta, GA Mastered at COS Mastering, Atlanta, GA Track IV Inspired by the collage in Stevie Wonder's mirrored sunglasses (see the Music of My Mind LP) Jane Lle Publishing (ASCAP)/ Tang Nivri Publishing/ Chrysalis Music (ASCAP) Produced for Wondaland Productions Recorded at Dali Jane Lle Publishing (ASCAP)/ Tang Nivri Publishing (ASCAP)/ Ink Is An Instrument (ASCAP) Produced for Wondaland Productions Recorded at Wondaland Recording Studios, Atlanta, GA Mixed at Wondaland Studios, Atlanta, GA Additional mixing by Phil Tan for RiotProof Productions and Christopher Carmouche Mastered at COS Mastering, Atlanta, GA Track VI Inspired by the atomic bombs in Muhammad Ali's fists and Martin McKnight's famous "I Have A Scream" speech Jane Lle Publishing (ASCAP)/ Tang Nivri Publishing (ASCAP)/ Ink Is An Instrument (ASCAP) Produced for Wondaland Productions Documented at It's Backwards." scene in Purple Rain Produced for Wondaland Productions Recorded at Wondaland Studio, Atlanta, GA Mixed and mastered at Wondaland Recording Studios, Atlanta, GA Track IX Inspired by
